diagrams.title: Esquema básico batería/alternador (placeholder)
diagrams.data: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='1200' height='800' viewBox='0 0 1200 800'><rect width='1200' height='800' fill='#0b1020'/><g stroke='#ef4444' stroke-width='4' fill='none'><rect x='80' y='320' width='160' height='120' rx='12' stroke='#fff'/><text x='160' y='385' fill='#fff' text-anchor='middle' font-family='Arial' font-size='18'>Batería</text><line x1='240' y1='380' x2='520' y2='380'/><circle cx='520' cy='380' r='10' fill='#ef4444'/><rect x='540' y='320' width='200' height='120' rx='12' stroke='#fff'/><text x='640' y='385' fill='#fff' text-anchor='middle' font-family='Arial' font-size='18'>Alternador</text><line x1='740' y1='380' x2='1040' y2='380'/><rect x='1040' y='340' width='100' height='80' rx='8' stroke='#fff'/><text x='1090' y='385' fill='#fff' text-anchor='middle' font-family='Arial' font-size='16'>ECM</text></g></svg>

dtc.title: Fallo de encendido aleatorio
dtc.notes: Bujías, bobinas, inyectores, fugas de vacío, baja compresión.

dtc.title: Mezcla pobre (B1)
dtc.notes: MAF sucio, fugas en admisión, combustible bajo, O2 pre-cat.
